pandas.replace_code:
def diff(arr, n: int, axis: int = 0):
    """
    difference of n between self,
    analogous to s-s.shift(n)

    Parameters
    ----------
    arr : ndarray
    n : int
        number of periods
    axis : int
        axis to shift on

    Returns
    -------
    shifted
    """

    if not isinstance(n, integer_types):
        raise ValueError("n must be an integer")

    na = np.nan
    dtype = arr.dtype
    is_timedelta = False

    if needs_i8_conversion(arr):
        dtype = np.float64
        arr = arr.view("i8")
        na = np.datetime64("NaT")
        is_timedelta = True

    out_arr = np.empty(arr.shape, dtype=dtype)

    na_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
    na_indexer[axis] = slice(None, n) if n >= 0 else slice(n, None)
    out_arr[tuple(na_indexer)] = na

    res_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
    res_indexer[axis] = slice(n, None) if n >= 0 else slice(None, n)
    
    lag_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
    lag_indexer[axis] = slice(None, -n) if n > 0 else slice(-n, None)

    if is_timedelta:
        res = arr[res_indexer]
        lag = arr[lag_indexer]

        mask = (arr[res_indexer] == na) | (arr[lag_indexer] == na)

        result = np.logical_xor(res, lag)  # Use bitwise XOR for boolean values

        result[mask] = na
        out_arr[res_indexer] = result
    else:
        out_arr[res_indexer] = np.logical_xor(arr[res_indexer], arr[lag_indexer])  # Use bitwise XOR for boolean values

    if is_timedelta:
        out_arr = out_arr.astype("timedelta64[ns]")

    return out_arr
